spans.text: The doorbell rings, signaling a visitor.
Even though it's been so long since I graduated, why do I still almost shout "Welcome!" when I hear this sound...
Everything in front of me is so familiar, yet it makes Taki feel particularly strange.
(Perhaps it's because it's been renovated... I feel like something is different.)
Indeed, many things are different.
RiNG, this cafe that has supported almost half of Taki's student life, unlike their band, which may or may not disband one day, is still full of vitality many years later.
(I remember there was a time when business wasn't very good, and Miss Rinrin kept shouting that she was going to close down...)
(Ah, speaking of which, Miss Rinrin was transferred to a new branch in the city a few years ago.)
(Now it seems that this store can live longer than I can...)
Hello, ordering here.
Oh...oh! Please wait a moment!
Hello, what would you like to order?
Are you new?
Eh...is it that obvious?

Your method of wiping cups is not correct - after washing, you must first invert them on the rack to drain most of the water, then use a sponge to absorb the remaining water droplets, and then wrap a dry towel around the inner wall three times and the outer wall once, and finally put it in the storage cabinet.

Also, your plates are also in the wrong position, you have to sort them by size and category, mixing them together will easily lead to mistakes during peak dining hours, which will affect the speed of serving - I say, didn't you receive training before joining the job?
Eh!! Is that so - due to various reasons, I was indeed forced to start working before the training was over...
Wait, let me rearrange it -
Have you done this kind of work before? This is my first time working! You are really my——
(Why does this person have a familiar sense of trouble...)
Well...if I had not resigned, perhaps I would be your foreman now - so can I start ordering?

Ah, sorry, sorry! What would you like to order? We recently have a new seasonal limited dessert~~ it's on the newly added insert in the menu, we haven't had time to advertise it yet, but you can definitely try it!
No need to look, I just noticed at the door that you have a new flavor of coffee.
Uh... Malt Iced Americano? That one, please give me a cup.
Taki flipped through the menu, which was much thicker than before.
(Uh... what an exaggerated set meal... it feels like all the syrup and cream in the world have been piled on...)
(Such a troublesome meal, I feel like only equally troublesome people would like to order it...)
(Wait, there's a panda print on this waffle? The latte art on the set meal coffee is also - and it comes with a panda pendant??)
(No! Why didn't I have this kind of event when I worked at RiNG??!!!)
Although her inner activities were intense, Taki still maintained the stubbornness and persistence of an adult on the surface.
Hello, I want a seasonal limited special meal, thank you.
It seemed that because of the time of day, there was only one novice behind the entire bar preparing food in a panic, and the process was much longer than Taki expected.
But she was surprisingly not as anxious as before.
(What a strange feeling.)
(Being able to see the remaining days has made me relax a little.)
(What is this...)
(The peace of mind... after the dust has settled...?)
Taki began to look around, taking advantage of this long-lost free time when she had nothing to do.

The signboard is still the same signboard, the cafe is still this cafe, and from the position of the bar, you can still see the commercial building with the karaoke signboard hanging high across the street through the floor-to-ceiling windows.
But something has indeed changed.
(Is it the atmosphere?)
Although it has been renovated, the overall style of the interior has not changed much. Taki Shiina looked around the cafe, trying to find the reason why she felt different.

The people working behind the bar are not herself and Rinrin, the person playing the guitar in the performance area is not Wildcat, the customers change batch after batch, the hall is full of unfamiliar faces, and in front of the dining table where Soyo and Tomori often sit, several students wearing modified Moon-no-mori uniforms are discussing their homework in a low voice.
(That's it, everything familiar is disappearing in the unfamiliar crowd, including that annoying pink...)
Annoying pink hair???!!!

As soon as she stepped into the door of the cafe, she heard a familiar voice calling. Anon Chihaya raised her head in the direction of the ear-piercing sound, and the lens of the selfie stick in her hand naturally turned - Taki Shiina came into view.

In such a mixed public place, and across most of the front hall, even Taki, who is so harsh, at this time also admitted that she could not completely push the blame for not reading the atmosphere to her suddenly appearing teammate.
Even if the other party is Anon Chihaya, who is the most skilled at reading the atmosphere.
But the current state is really not up to the standard that can be filmed...
Turn off your camera - or take it and sit where it can't film me!

Although they had just met not long ago, the excitement of the reunion still soared into the sky. Anon was about to rush to Taki's face to give her a hug, but her body stiffened because of the sudden scolding from the other party, and she had to urgently withdraw her steps halfway.
Anon carefully observed the small area of ​​the face exposed behind Taki's fingers, and tentatively continued to walk and put away the selfie stick, turning off the shooting mode.
Okay...Rikki, I've already turned off the camera...you're really a spoilsport.
Opening a gap between her fingers, a pair of eyes revealed a narrow edge from behind the gap. Taki spent a long time confirming whether what the pink hair in front of her said was true.
Then, she finally was willing to show her complete face again.
Huh? You doing this kind of thing is what's called being a spoilsport.
Eh, why did Rikki suddenly have the idea to come to RiNG today? Ah, if you're sitting at the bar... Rikki, you must be alone, right? Can I sit here?

Before, some fans were curious about the band's rehearsal, so I was thinking of coming today to record an introduction about RiNG for everyone, and by the way, take pictures of the seasonal limited desserts that have not been officially released as material for exploring the store - it's also good to recall the past occasionally, isn't it?
But it's too boring to act a one-man show in front of the camera alone... It's really the best to meet Rikki here!

If it's Rikki and me... whether it's memories of working at RING or rehearsing performances, or opinions on new products, they will definitely be very different, so my material can have more controversial——
(Has she finally been polluted by this profession?)
... Enough, you're really talking more and more.
Looking at Anon, who unknowingly said a lot of words, Taki suddenly felt a little restless, and her head inexplicably ached faintly.
Hiss... You really are... as troublesome as ever.
If you want to sit together, let's go to the table over there.
The two moved their positions together, changing from the bar to an ordinary two-person dining table near the floor-to-ceiling window to sit down.
Ah...ah! So you changed to this table, I was looking for you around the bar - this is the meal you ordered, sorry for the wait, I hope you enjoy your meal.
The clerk came and went in a hurry. Taki certainly understood the hard work of guarding the bar alone, but the pink hair opposite her who was directly ignored seemed to have different ideas.
She didn't recognize me? She didn't recognize me?! She didn't actually recognize me?!!!
Rikki~~ Look at her——
Please spare me... You can't ask everyone in the world to know you, right?

I'm the one asking you to spare me - this is me! It's me! The famous rhythm guitarist of the MyGO!!!!! band, the up-and-coming YouTuber, the number of fans on my personal account is as high as 120,000, and the maximum number of simultaneous viewers during the live broadcast is 37,205...
I once received twenty top-amount red SCs at one time——me! Me like this! It's okay not to recognize me! At least as a customer, I shouldn't be so ignored, right!
(I should have known long ago that choosing to come here was not a good idea.)
If you want to be kicked out with me now, you can just say it directly.
Why is your attitude worse than the day we first met...
Eh? This? You actually ordered this?
Malt Iced Americano... sounds bad...
You only ordered a cup of coffee? Only ordered a cup of coffee?? Nothing else?
What else? Coming to a cafe, isn't it just to drink coffee?
You're really a super coffee fanatic... Forget it!
Hello! I want to order a seasonal limited panda special meal——
(What——a panda special meal?! The new product is actually this???)
Rikki will help me eat it later!
I didn't expect it! Rikki! You also have a day when your taste gets better - look at how rich and cute this set meal is!

How monotonous you used to be when you only drank coffee!! Adult life should be more fulfilling - by the way, can you allow me to take a photo before you eat it? And record a short video introduction? Of course, it would be even better if you would share a little bit with me so I can try the taste!
Whatever.
Saying this, Taki pretended to casually pull out the menu, turned to the new product promotion page, looking like she was just looking at it to pass the time.
(Wait, there's a panda print on this waffle? The latte art on the set meal coffee is also - and it comes with a panda pendant??)
(Damn it! I should have ordered this!!)
Eh~~~ Rikki, don't be so indifferent! You like it very much, don't you! Panda!
Congratulations, even though her inner emotions were turbulent, Taki still maintained an adult's composure on the surface.
Eh~~~ Rikki, don't be so indifferent!
Isn't this also for the sake of MyGO!!!!!, working so hard here to record material! Do you know how hard it is to run an account!

Yesterday, our band account lost three followers! Two of them were even old fans who had been following for more than three years!!! What a tragic defeat! It's all because our daily updates are too few!

Speaking of which, everyone is so busy now, even the rehearsal schedule has to rely on luck to put together, otherwise I wouldn't be reduced to ordering such a big dessert alone and talking to the camera like an idiot for half a day, and finally have to pack it home myself - and then have to eat it for three days.
If everyone was here together, I wouldn't have to worry about the amount of material.
Ah, I'm so lucky today…! Rikki is here! I don't have to solve a big portion by myself! Please, please… as long as Rikki is willing to help me…
The panda pendant attached to the set meal will belong to Rikki, how about it?!!
It is indeed a super big portion - the waiter appropriately delivered the additional food to the table.
Ah, but I'm very lucky today! Rikki, you're here! I don't have to solve a big portion by myself!
(Looking at it this way... indeed, this portion is a bit too much)
Take a nice picture and send it to me, as for the set meal... try to eat as much as you can first.
Eat until you can't eat anymore.
(Of course... of course it's not for the pendant, um, at least not entirely.)
Rikki…
The pink-haired girl showed a bright sense of emotion in her eyes.
But the words she said next were completely different from what Taki Shiina had guessed.
So Rikki is clearly very free, right?
To be able to sit in a cafe at this time today.
She also went to the tea restaurant that night…
I say, if you don't take a picture, the cream on the edge of the waffle is going to collapse, right?
Ahhhhh! Why didn't you remind me earlier!

Anon Chihaya complained, and frantically put out the equipment she had brought, and after constantly modifying the angle to take a pile of photos, she began to debug the camera lens, repeatedly recording multiple times, and finally gathered enough material to edit.
The set meal, which was mainly cute, was obviously no longer as bright as it was when it first came out.
This was the first time Taki had watched Anon do "influencer work" up close.

To be honest, when Anon, who changed her interests almost every week in college, first announced to everyone in the band that she was going to enter the influencer world to wash away the infamy of "Anon Tokyo", even Tomori didn't believe that this hobby could overcome Anon Chihaya's three-minute enthusiasm.
(But Anon succeeded. She succeeded in persisting, and successfully turned this hobby into her livelihood.)
(And me, who ridiculed her in the beginning... What do I like, what do I need, what do I insist on is...)
Taki Shiina interrupted Anon, who was excitedly holding the video, watching it, and interjecting with some interesting and difficult things about her work.
Anon, do you like this job?
Or rather, when you are usually looking for material or live broadcast topics, don't you feel like your inspiration is exhausted, very tired, very tired? Don't you feel bored at some point?
Anon Chihaya raised her head from checking the material.
She was a little surprised by the question Taki Shiina asked - after all, she had been very quiet, seeming to be out of her mind.
Anon thought that she, as before, didn't care what she said.
Rikki... are you concerned about me?
Who is concerned about you?! Don't get the point wrong, okay!
I didn't expect you to ask me about live broadcasting - I always thought you were really not interested.
This question... I think it's difficult for me to answer you now.
Since it's difficult to answer, then it's okay not to answer...
But, if you really want to know how I feel - I have another live broadcast later, would you like to come to my live broadcast room to see?
Oh! I mean, would you like to come to my house to see how I usually do live broadcasts?
Taki Shiina did not refuse.
